name: Dominus (itch) (Sean Y)
description:
Dominus is a challenging 2D action platformer with snappy controls and quick respawn. Deflection is the core mechanic of the game. Keep in mind, every attack can be deflected.

*If you think the game is too hard, utilize*

*[SHIFT - Run]

*[Mouse Right Click - Deflect]

Knowing these two can make the game easier. The game is also meant to be played repeatedly, hence the quick respawn and smooth controls. The controls are similar to Metroidvania games.

You can also see me play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ql4jySCCJHc
